Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the 21st-floor balcony. What is your next move, given the target location for your next move?  
choose:  
A. I rise.  
B. I rotate the camera downward.  
C. I fly forward.  
D. I turn left.  
E. I turn right.  
F. I rotate the camera upward.  
G. I descend.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: A; Reason: To navigate to the 21st-floor balcony, the agent needs to rise vertically since the current perspective is at a lower level relative to the target floor. Rising will bring the agent closer to the desired floor.
